text: Bumetopia elongata is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Stephan von Breuning in 1972. It is known from the Philippines.BioLib.cz - Bumetopia elongata. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Homonoeini Category:Beetles described in 1972
title: Bumetopia elongata
